**[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 50 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 48 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 45 [Nightmare Rook](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2353) **Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 450 **Perception** +38; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23) **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +34, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +38, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +35, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +35 **Str** +10 **Dex** +6 **Con** +6 **Int** +5 **Wis** +8 **Cha** +5 --- **AC** 46 **Fort** +34 **Ref** +34 **Will** +38 **HP** 380 , regeneration 20 (deactivated by cold iron or lawful) **Resistances** physical 20 (except cold iron or lawful) **[Buck](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=6)** DC 42
**[Frightful Presence](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=17)** ([aura](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=5), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [_fear_](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) 60 feet, DC 39
**Wing Rebuff** **Trigger** A creature moves from beyond the reach of the roc's wing to within the reach of the roc's wing. **Effect** The roc makes a wing Strike against the triggering creature. If the roc Pushes the creature, it disrupts the triggering move action. --- **Speed** 20 feet, fly 80 feet **Melee** beak +38 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 4d12+18 piercing **Melee** talon +38 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 4d8+18 slashing plus [Improved Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=27) **Melee** wing +38 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 4d8+18 bludgeoning plus [Improved Push](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=29) 10 feet **Occult Innate Spells** DC 42, attack +34 - **8th** [Phantasmal Killer](/Spells.aspx?ID=219) (×3) - **9th** [Phantasmal Calamity](/Spells.aspx?ID=218), [Weird](/Spells.aspx?ID=375) - **10th** [Alter Reality](/Spells.aspx?ID=8) **Flying Strafe** The roc Flies up to its Speed and makes two talon Strikes at any point during that movement. Each Strike must target a different creature. Each attack takes the normal multiple attack penalty. **Snack** A roc gains a +2 circumstance bonus to hit with its beak Strike if the target is grabbed or restrained in its talon. **Snatch** A roc can Fly at half Speed while it has a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33) in either or both of its talons, carrying that creature along with it.
